name: Chang Tou
personality: Reserved and disciplined, but compassionate on the battlefield.
story: Xianliang Chang was born and raised in a small village in southern China. When he turned 18, he was conscripted into the Chinese army, where he underwent basic training and was selected to become a combat life saver. Xianliang has since been deployed to Altis, where he is currently serving with the OPFOR forces. Despite his young age, Xianliang has already seen the horrors of war and is determined to use his medical training to save as many lives as possible.
